Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
[PROMPT] 

Please write a reel script for me based on the following transcript. I want the title, description, hashtags, timestamps, middle text, and tags for YouTube reels. Add one Best hashtag in Title. Use simple, easily understandable language, write like an intermediate student and apply your knowledge of YouTube algorithms and vidIQ to optimize it for better results. The content should be structured for a general audience, and focus on creating curiosity and engagement. Do not use Corporate Jargons. Make Title and Description Very much creative and simple also better than normal ones used by Most of The people.
